thread.section_title: Boy, 4, hanged himself in tragic changing room accident – Metro
thread.title: Boy, 4, hanged himself in tragic changing room accident
thread.title_full: Boy, 4, hanged himself in tragic changing room accident

author: Nicole Morley
title: Boy, 4, hanged himself in tragic changing room accident
text:
Four-year-old Ryu Pena hanged himself in a tragic accident (Picture: Gofundme) A four-year-old boy hanged himself inside a changing room in a freak accident. 
Ryu Pena, four, was wearing a hooded sweatshirt which ended up getting caught on a hanger on the wall.
MMA fighter War Machine faces jail for attacking porn star ex-girlfriend Christy Mack The boy was rushed from the Again Thrift & More in Mankato, Minnesota, to a nearby hospital.
Despite efforts from emergency responders, Ryu was pronounced dead.
Police say he was alone in the changing room, though family members, from St James, were in the store at the time.
Ryu had recently become a big brother(Picture: Gofundme) Commander Daniel Schisel called the death a tragic accident and said no charges are being pursued.
Deadly spider venom could be a lifesaver after all A fundraiser has been set up to help his family with funeral costs. 
The fundraiser was set up by Ryu’s aunt Jessica Cuevas.
She said: ‘no mother or father should have to go through something like this and lose their child.’
Adding: ‘Ryu was such a sweet boy, with a gorgeous smile, an a unique little personality. ‘His best friend was his older sister Glory, he followed her around everywhere.
‘He was so happy and full of life and he just became a big brother 4 months ago, to Rolando jr, whom he loved so much.
Ryu’s funeral service will be held in Minnesota, confirmed Cuevas.
